title: Hybrid-Based Collaborative Design Leadership Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of the Design Process and Fundamental Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen collaborative design competencies for managers/leaders in science fields, cultivating practical application skills through project execution in blended (online-offline) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete collaborative design projects using three or more digital tools in hybrid environments.
Learners can divide roles in PBL teams and achieve over 80% task participation rates.
Learners can propose two or more innovative solutions to real corporate problems by applying the design thinking process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
